data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for INTIMATION OF BOARD MEETING TO BE HELD ON FRIDAY FEBRUARY 06 2026.
data.news_body: Capillary Technologies India Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 06/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve We wish to inform you that the meeting of the Board of Directors of Capillary Technologies India Limited (the Company) is scheduled to be held on Friday February 06 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Capillary Technologies India Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 21 2025 the Equity Shares of Capillary Technologies India Ltd (Scrip Code: 544614) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251120-42 dated November 20 2025.
